lx4p

Class LXDMXEthernet

  • java.lang.Object
    • lx4p.LXDMXInterface
      • lx4p.LXDMXEthernet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LXArtNet, LXSACN

    public abstract class LXDMXEthernet
extends LXDMXInterface
    LXDMXEthernet

    LXArtNet partially implements the Art-Net Ethernet Communication Standard.
    http://www.artisticlicence.com

    LXArtNet supports capturing a single universe of DMX data
    from Art-Net packets read from UDP.
    LXArtNet will automatically respond to ArtPoll packets
    by sending a unicast reply directly to the poll.

    LXArtNet does not support merge and will only accept ArtDMX output packets
    from the first IP address that it receives a packet from.
    This can be reset by sending an ArtAddress cancel merge command.

    Art-Net(TM) Designed by and Copyright Artistic Licence (UK) Ltd

    Author:
    Claude Heintz

      • createDMXEthernet

        public static LXDMXEthernet createDMXEthernet(boolean use_sacn,
                              java.lang.String networkInterface,
                              java.lang.String networkAddress,
                              java.lang.String targetAddress)
        Factory method to create an LXDMXEthernet interface
        Parameters:
        use_sacn - Determines if returned interface will be LXArtNet or LXSACN class
        networkInterface - if not null, searches for an InetAddress associated with the named interface (eg "en0")
        networkAddress - specific IP address to use for binding socket. Can be null if networkInterface is specified
        targetAddress - either broadcast address for Art-Net or multicast address for sACN
        Returns:
        created instance of LXArtNet or LXSACN or null if socket could not be opened
